snippet: A Gathering of the Tribes, a fixture in the East Village, is shutting down after a landlord-tenant dispute and an argument over who controlled a wall painted by the artist David Hammons.
abstract: A Gathering of the Tribes Gallery in the East Village, fixture that helped define neighborhood's mix of creativity and grit, has slowly been emptying out, final chapter of a landlord-tenant dispute; question has arisen over gallery wall painted by artist David Hammons; gallery owner Steve Cannon has removed sections of wall, even though lawyer for building's owner has said he could not take it.
lead_paragraph: A Gathering of the Tribes, a fixture in the East Village, is shutting down after a landlord-tenant dispute and an argument over who controlled a wall painted by the artist David Hammons.

headline.main: As East Village Gallery Closes, a Dispute Lingers
headline.print_headline: As East Village Gallery Closes, a Dispute Lingers
